attributes.action: Introduce HGV No Overtaking sections on Two Lane Dual Carriageways.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: One of the commonest causes of holdups and tailbacks on our Dual Carriageways is caused by HGV's passing and re-passing each other, often taking several miles to do so.   This causes frustration, undertaking and accidents in the following queue.   Free up the roads and let other vehicles use them efficiently..............

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
